tool_description:
93 voices, 39 languages, 2 speech engines. Leveraging deep learning technologies to synthesize natural-sounding human speech, the "AI-Powered Text-To-Speech" API allows developers to easily integrate TTS capabilities. Along with the AI-powered voices, we have many voices with traditional TTS implementations.

Full API documentation available here: https://medium.com/@morpheus22/ai-powered-text-to-speech-api-available-on-rapid-api-marketplace-ddfe96875065
name: AI-Powered Text To Speech
title: AI-Powered Text To Speech

api_list.name: Synthesize Speech
api_list.description:
The Synthesize Speech API is documented here: [https://medium.com/@morpheus22/ai-powered-text-to-speech-api-available-on-rapid-api-marketplace](https://medium.com/@morpheus22/ai-powered-text-to-speech-api-available-on-rapid-api-marketplace-ddfe96875065#34c6)

![Documentation on medium.com](https://dl.dropbox.com/scl/fi/tmj97lrbgy5u1q3aoke3b/medium.png?rlkey=yc32o6ddvmwr2wftp266p087y&dl=0)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-powered-text-to-speech1.p.rapidapi.com/synthesize-speech"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-powered-text-to-speech1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
